description: This Java source file defines a class named MockLight, which extends a base class MockZigbeeDevice. It simulates a mock Zigbee light device with functionality to turn on/off, toggle, set light level, and report wattage, including associated clusters and endpoints.

classes.name: MockLight
classes.description: A mock representation of a Zigbee-compatible light device with control over power, level, and wattage, including associated clusters and endpoints.

methods.name: MockLight
methods.description: Constructs a MockLight object with specified name, EUI64, and whether to use the metering cluster.

methods.name: isOn
methods.description: Returns whether the light is currently on.

methods.name: turnOn
methods.description: Turns the light on and outputs a message to the console.

methods.name: turnOff
methods.description: Turns the light off and outputs a message to the console.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the current power state of the light and prints the new state.

methods.name: setLightLevel
methods.description: Sets the light's level based on a percentage input, converting it to the internal scale.

methods.name: getOnLevel
methods.description: Retrieves the current on level of the light from the level cluster.

methods.name: getLevel
methods.description: Calculates and returns the current light level as a percentage.

methods.name: setWatts
methods.description: Sets the wattage measurement in the appropriate cluster and outputs a message.

methods.name: getWatts
methods.description: Retrieves the current power wattage from the appropriate cluster.
